{"id":841849376,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1668243570,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"50 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/841849376/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode result;\n        ListNode *temp = &result;\n        int carry = 0;\n        while (l1 && l2) {\n            int sum = l1->val + l2->val + carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            sum = sum % 10;\n            temp->next = new ListNode(sum);\n            temp = temp->next;\n            l1 = l1->next;\n            l2 = l2->next;\n        }\n        while (l1) {\n            int sum = l1->val + carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            sum = sum % 10;\n            temp->next = new ListNode(sum);\n            temp = temp->next;\n            l1 = l1->next;\n        }\n        while (l2) {\n            int sum = l2->val + carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            sum = sum % 10;\n            temp->next = new ListNode(sum);\n            temp = temp->next;\n            l2 = l2->next;\n        }\n        if (carry) {\n            temp->next = new ListNode(carry);\n            temp = temp->next;\n        }\n        temp->next = NULL;\n        \n        return result.next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false}
